mapper.select:
SELECT mci.ss_type, SUM(mci.com_amount_orig) AS com_amount_orig_sum FROM ss_month_charge mc INNER JOIN ss_month_charge_item mci ON mc.month_charge_id = mci.month_charge_id AND mci.is_active = 1 WHERE mc.ss_month = #{ssMonth} AND mc.is_active = 1 AND mc.com_account_id = #{comAccountId} AND (( mc.cost_category IN(1, 2, 3) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ss_month_charge b WHERE (( #{ssMonth} > b.ss_month_belong AND b.cost_category IN (6, 7)) OR (b.ss_month_belong = #{ssMonth} AND b.cost_category = 5)) AND b.is_active = 1 AND b.com_account_id = #{comAccountId} AND b.emp_archive_id = mc.emp_archive_id ) ) OR mc.cost_category = 5) AND ( mc.cost_category != 9 OR (mc.cost_category = 9 AND mci.com_amount > 0 AND mci.emp_amount > 0) )
AND LEFT(mc.ss_month, 4) = LEFT(mc.ss_month_belong, 4)
AND LEFT(mc.ss_month, 4) > LEFT(mc.ss_month_belong, 4)
GROUP BY mci.ss_type
